required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multifocal Contact Lens Use in Previous Contact Lens Wearers With Near Vision Demands
clinical_study.official_title: P/331/09/C: Multifocal Pilot Study: Refitting Drop Outs (GARM)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the use of a multifocal contact lens in people who previously wore contact lenses but discontinued due to age-related, near vision demands.

primary_outcome.description: Overall satisfaction with the lenses was interpreted by and assessed by the subject as a single, retrospective measurement of one week's wear time. Overall satisfaction with the lenses was recorded on a questionnaire as a numerical rating on a scale of 1 to 100, with 1 being completely dissatisfied, and 100 being excellent, completely satisfied.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Multifocal CL / Single vision CL + reading glasses
arm_group.description: Lotrafilcon B multifocal contact lenses (CL) worn first, with lotrafilcon B single vision contact lenses (CL) and over-reader spectacles worn second. Both contact lens products worn bilaterally on a daily wear basis; over-reader spectacles worn on an as-needed basis.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Single vision CL + reading glasses / Multifocal CL
arm_group.description: Lotrafilcon B single vision contact lenses (CL) and over-reader spectacles worn first, with lotrafilcon B multifocal contact lenses (CL) worn second. Both contact lens products worn bilaterally on a daily wear basis; over-reader spectacles worn on an as-needed basis.

intervention.description: Commercially marketed, silicone hydrogel, multifocal contact lens for daily wear use
intervention.arm_group_label: Multifocal CL / Single vision CL + reading glasses
Single vision CL + reading glasses / Multifocal CL

intervention.intervention_name: lotrafilcon B single vision contact lens
intervention.description: Commercially marketed, silicone hydrogel, single vision contact lens for daily wear use
intervention.arm_group_label: Multifocal CL / Single vision CL + reading glasses
Single vision CL + reading glasses / Multifocal CL

intervention.description: Reading glasses worn over single vision contact lenses for near vision work on an as-needed basis
intervention.arm_group_label: Multifocal CL / Single vision CL + reading glasses
Single vision CL + reading glasses / Multifocal CL

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- has discontinued contact lens wear primarily due to age-related, near vision demands
- requires a reading add of +0.50 to +1.75 D (inclusive) and is correctable to at least 6/9 monocular, distance and near with spectacle correction
- has had an ocular examination in the last 2 years
- Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
Exclusion Criteria:
- has any ocular disease
- has more than a 2.00D prescription difference between eyes
- cannot be fit successfully with the study contact lenses
- has any systemic disease affecting ocular health
- is using any systemic or topical medications that may affect ocular health
- has undergone corneal refractive surgery
- Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply

facility.name: University of Waterloo Centre for Contact Lens Research

group.title: Multifocal CL / Single Vision CL+ Reading Glasses
group.description: Lotrafilcon B multifocal contact lenses (CL) worn first, with lotrafilcon B single vision contact lenses (CL) and over-reader spectacles worn second. Both contact lens products worn bilaterally on a daily wear basis; over-reader spectacles worn on an as-needed basis.

group.title: Single Vision CL + Reading Glasses / Multifocal CL
group.description: Lotrafilcon B single vision contact lenses (CL) and over-reader spectacles worn first, with lotrafilcon B multifocal contact lenses (CL) worn second. Both contact lens products worn bilaterally on a daily wear basis; over-reader spectacles worn on an as-needed basis.

group.title: Overall Study
group.description: This reporting group includes all enrolled and dispensed subjects.

outcome.title: Overall Satisfaction With the Lenses
outcome.description: Overall satisfaction with the lenses was interpreted by and assessed by the subject as a single, retrospective measurement of one week's wear time. Overall satisfaction with the lenses was recorded on a questionnaire as a numerical rating on a scale of 1 to 100, with 1 being completely dissatisfied, and 100 being excellent, completely satisfied.

group.title: Lotrafilcon B Multifocal Contact Lens
group.description: Commercially marketed, lotrafilcon B, silicone hydrogel, multifocal contact lens for daily wear use

group.title: Lotrafilcon B Single Vision Contact Lens + Reading Glasses
group.description: Commercially marketed, lotrafilcon B, silicone hydrogel, single vision contact lenses for daily wear use, with over-reader spectacles worn as needed

measure.title: Overall Satisfaction With the Lenses
measure.description: Overall satisfaction with the lenses was interpreted by and assessed by the subject as a single, retrospective measurement of one week's wear time. Overall satisfaction with the lenses was recorded on a questionnaire as a numerical rating on a scale of 1 to 100, with 1 being completely dissatisfied, and 100 being excellent, completely satisfied.

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse event data were collected for the duration of the trial. Individual subject exposure = 1 week per product, total 2 weeks.

group.title: Multifocal Contact Lens
group.description: Commercially marketed lotrafilcon B multifocal contact lenses

group.title: Single Vision Contact Lens
group.description: Commercially marketed lotrafilcon B single vision contact lenses

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
